metadata.Title: CVE-2014-3529 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The OPC SAX setup in Apache POI before 3.10.1 allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via an OpenXML file containing an XML external entity declaration in conjunction with an entity reference, related to an XML External Entity (XXE) issue.

criterions.comment: libapache-poi-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
